original_text: But if a wicked person turns away from the wickedness they have committed and does what is just and right, they will save their life.
korean_text: 만일 악인이 그 행한 악을 떠나 정의와 공의를 행하면 그 영혼을 보전하리라

sentences.original_text: But if a wicked person turns away
from the wickedness they have committed
and does what is just and right
